mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, code, name, imagePath, infoImagePath, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM shop_list ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, code, name, imagePath FROM shop_list
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND ${endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_list (num, code, name, imagePath, infoImagePath) VALUES(shop_list_seq.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{imagePath}, #{infoImagePath})
